trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an optimistic concurrency violation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生開放式同步存取違規時擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle exceptions in your code, see <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何在程式碼中處理例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Exception>。
初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle exceptions in your code, see <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何在程式碼中處理例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Exception>。
初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle exceptions in your code, see <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何在程式碼中處理例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Exception>。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException" /> with a specialized error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用特定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle exceptions in your code, see <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何在程式碼中處理例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Exception>。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況，若未指定內部例外狀況，則為 null 參考 (Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException" /> that uses a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化使用所指定錯誤訊息和內部例外狀況參考的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException" /> 新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle exceptions in your code, see <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何在程式碼中處理例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Exception>。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況，若未指定內部例外狀況，則為 null 參考 (Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException" /> that uses a specified error message, a reference to the inner exception, and an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化使用所指定錯誤訊息、內部例外狀況參考，及可列舉 <see cref="T:System.Data.OptimisticConcurrencyException" /> 物件集合的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle exceptions in your code, see <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何在程式碼中處理例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Exception>。
